name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: An introductory course in computer science covering fundamental concepts and basic programming skills.

name: Calculus I
description: A foundational course in calculus covering limits, derivatives, and integrals.

name: English Literature
description: An exploration of major works and authors in English literature from various periods.

name: Introduction to Biology
description: A basic course covering key concepts in biology, including cell structure, genetics, and ecology.

name: Introduction to Philosophy
description: An overview of major philosophical ideas and thinkers from ancient to modern times.

name: General Chemistry
description: A comprehensive introduction to chemical principles including reactions, stoichiometry, and thermodynamics.

name: World History
description: A survey of major historical events and developments from ancient to modern times.

name: Art History
description: An exploration of art movements and styles throughout history, from classical to contemporary.

name: Microeconomics
description: A study of individual and firm behavior in the market, including supply and demand analysis.

name: Introduction to Psychology
description: An overview of psychological theories, research methods, and applications in human behavior.

name: Statistics for Business
description: An introduction to statistical methods and their application in business decision-making.
